backend/main.mo: Actor implementing registration, session validation, and user profile storage with access‑control checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module mapping old actor state to the new reduced state containing sessionStore and userProfiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and tests tied to registration and authentication improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of multiple frontend files across UI, state, and navigation layers.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing auth states, profile setup, and rendering the responsive application shell.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication context handling session restore, validation, registration, login, logout, and backend connection errors.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for saving, loading, validating, and clearing auth session data in localStorage, including timestamp normalization.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Exports a hook that returns auth context from AuthProvider.
Provides a centered authentication page layout with logo, title, optional description, and child content.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a category with text/voice channels, supports drag‑and‑drop reordering, and allows admins to create channels.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Dialog for creating a new server category with validation, backend guard checks, and mutation error handling.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels within a category with type selection, validation, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input component that sends text messages to the selected channel with backend guard and UI controls.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected channel, auto‑scrolls on updates, shows empty states, and includes the message composer.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a chat message with avatar, author name, timestamp, and click-to-view profile behavior.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Displays a searchable list of community servers and allows joining them.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Shows a server preview card with name, description, member count, and a join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the direct messages home view or friends view depending on navigation state.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Displays a friend's avatar, name, status, and action buttons for messaging, calls, and options.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides tabs for managing friends, requests, and adding new friends with associated actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Desktop layout combining server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses which main view to display based on navigation state, including chat, DMs, discovery, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile layout with slide-out panels for servers, channels, members, and access to settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between mobile and desktop layouts based on screen width.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Shows the list of server members with avatars and allows selecting a member profile.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Sidebar listing server categories with drag-and-drop reordering and category creation controls.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Mobile header showing navigation buttons and current server or view title.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Left rail showing ordered server icons, home navigation, and server creation button.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for initial profile setup allowing users to choose and submit a display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog to assign or remove roles from a user with pending-change handling and role listing.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Overlay displaying a user's profile, roles, and management actions including role assignment.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog for creating a new server with name, description, and backend action validation.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Renders a server icon image or a fallback with the server's initial if no icon exists.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog for creating new text or voice channels, handling form input, category selection, and channel creation mutations.
Dialog allowing users to move a channel to a different category with selection and confirmation controls.
Lets admins select a server member, view their roles, and open a dialog to manage role assignments.
Displays and formats the server's audit log entries, handling loading, errors, and sorting by timestamp.
Shows server categories and channels with support for ordering, admin-only movement controls, and channel creation.
Form for editing server description, images, and community mode, loading initial data and saving via mutations.
Allows selecting a server member, viewing their roles, and opening a dialog to manage assignments using fetched role/member data.
Displays and creates roles for a server, including color selection and listing existing roles with management options.
Provides the layout and navigation for server settings, switching between settings pages based on user selection.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Provides UI for selecting theme and adjusting text scale using app settings.
Loads and edits user profile, username, and account info, with save operations for profile fields and username.
Container for user settings navigation, switching between profile and appearance pages and handling logout.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Shows backend connection status with loading, error instructions, and retry support, hiding when connected.
Renders a stage channel view with static speaker and audience lists and a raise-hand button.
Displays voice channel participants, connection state, and controls for joining, leaving, muting, and deafening.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Returns whether backend actions should be disabled based on backend connection state.
Determines backend readiness by combining safe actor state with a minimal health check and exposes connection status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Tracks whether the viewport width is below a given breakpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Logs the user out through the auth provider and clears all React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, usernames, servers, and channel info.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely initializes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, handling retries and validation of required methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, base styles, and a utility transition class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements sign‑in and sign‑up UI with form validation and auth integration.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides navigation context managing views, server/channel selection, and UI state.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Handles localStorage-based notification overrides and mute checks for servers and channels.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Manages persistent user settings like theme, accent color, text scale, notifications, and keybinds.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces for backend entities such as servers, channels, roles, and audit logs.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Applies and builds ordering for categories and channels based on persisted server ordering data.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Provides utilities to remove a specific DOM element by XPath and observe for reinsertions.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Provides utilities to sanitize hex color strings and compute lightness and contrast text colors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if it doesn't resolve within the given duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, containers, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and feature requests for implementing registration and session handling.
